sentences.en: A distribution function of droplet volume was derived using the information entropy.
sentences.cn: 采用最大熵原理,推导出喷雾场液滴体积分布函数.

sentences.en: At high pressures, the combustion model should include droplet heating as well as phase change.
sentences.cn: 在高压下, 燃烧模型应当包括液滴加热和相变.

sentences.en: Controlled droplet combustion experimentation has led to the establishment of the following important facts and patterns.
sentences.cn: 受到控制的液滴燃烧试验确定了下列重要事实和特性.

sentences.en: Droplet ignition and extinction in practical combustors are strongly influenced by forced convection and turbulence.
sentences.cn: 在实际燃烧室中,液滴点火和熄火受到强迫对流和紊流的强烈影响.

sentences.en: Droplets of sweat were welling up on his forehead.
sentences.cn: 一颗颗小汗珠从他额头上不断冒出来。

sentences.en: I am a droplet in the ocean of divinity.
sentences.cn: 我是神性的海洋中的一滴水.

sentences.en: I, a small droplet, surged out from sea.
sentences.cn: 我, 是海浪激出的一粒小水滴.

sentences.en: Into this aperture a droplet of mercury was poured.
sentences.cn: 一小滴水银滴进了这个小孔.

sentences.en: Keywords: droplet impact, spray technology, microarray biochip, micro - droplet experiments, theoretical analysis.
sentences.cn: 关键词: 液滴与介面撞击 、 喷雾技术 、 微阵列晶片 、 微液滴实验 、 现象理论分析.

sentences.en: METHODS: Ketoconazole calcium alginate gel beads were prepared by droplet method.
sentences.cn: 目的: 考察酮康唑海藻酸钙凝胶小球的制备工艺和最优处方.

sentences.en: No intrepid picture be not a droplet like me!
sentences.cn: 不强悍的图俺一般是不发滴!

sentences.en: Similar comments apply for extinction due to the droplet size becoming insufficient.
sentences.cn: 对于因液滴尺寸不断减小而引起的熄火也可作类似的说明.

sentences.en: The droplet transfer form is short circulating transfer.
sentences.cn: 焊丝的熔滴过渡方式为典型的短路过渡.

sentences.en: The rate of droplet growth under different conditions can be evaluated.
sentences.cn: 可以计算在不同条件下的云滴增长率.

sentences.en: The test results showed that increasing droplet size was associated with better stability.
sentences.cn: 试验结果表明,增加液滴尺寸将使稳定性提高.

sentences.en: This light consists of a glass tube containing argon and a droplet of mercury.
sentences.cn: 这种灯是由一根充有氩气和微量汞的玻璃管组成.

trans.tran_en: a very small drop of liquid
